page.description: The LABEL.PREVIEW() method displays the Preview dialog box showing the selected label.
page.syntax: Label_Name as C = LABEL.PREVIEW(C layoutname [,C filter [,C order [,L modal [,L session_modal [,* arguments [,* options ]]]]]])

argument.name: layoutname
argument.description: The name of the label to preview.

argument.name: filter
argument.description: Optional. Default = ".T." (All records). A character filter expression that evaluates to a logical value and selects records from the table.

argument.name: order
argument.description: Optional. Default = record order. A character order expression that sorts selected records.

item.name: .T.
item.description: The user cannot change focus without closing the dialog.

item.name: .F.
item.description: The user can change focus without closing the dialog.

item.name: .T.
item.description: This means that any script that calls the LABEL.PREVIEW() method will pause until the Print Preview window is closed. However, the preview window itself is not a modal dialog box. The user is free to select other windows in Alpha Anywhere.

item.name: .F.
item.description: The script does not pause until the Print Preview window is closed.
